name: Avoidance (magso)
description:
Controls:

Simply click/tap in the direction you wish to go in.

Objective:

Direct the blue plasma ball through the orb; the orb will then teleport to a new location. This will earn you 10 points to your score however the score slowly decreases over time at a rate of 1 point every 3 seconds.

The game ends when you get hit by a red laser ball.
